topic.title: FAQ
topic.shortdesc: Answers to frequently asked questions about the SmartHome Hub.

body.p:
Q: How many devices can I connect to the SmartHome Hub?
A: You can connect up to 50 devices depending on network conditions and usage patterns.

Q: Is remote access available?
A: Yes, you can manage your smart home remotely via the SmartHome app with a stable internet connection.

Q: Does the Hub support third-party devices?
A: Absolutely! The Hub is compatible with many popular brands including Philips Hue, Nest, Ring, and more.

Q: How frequently are firmware updates released?
A: Firmware updates are typically released on a monthly basis to ensure security and performance improvements.

Q: Is there a subscription fee?
A: No, the basic features are subscription-free. Optional premium services are available.

Q: What should I do if I encounter an issue that is not listed here?
A: Consult the troubleshooting guide or contact our support team for further assistance.
